imdb.plot outline: Simple and universal. Since ever, children learn songs, and, since ever, these present animals : friendly, mean, cunning, not sly - Children listen, laugh and fall asleep with pictures of savannah, in which they imagine flying lions, giraffes that row on the Nile, armies of lemurs coming to give them a hug. At this age, animals have for only border the children's imagination. So, observe the hippo in a beauty salon has really nothing astonishing ; not more than look at the baboons swinging in the air and discover a few characteristics of each animal.
